beer.beer_description:
The quality, care and dedication that goes into Crown Lager is evident from the first sip.

Crown Lager has a bright golden appearance with a solid creamy head. The fruity aroma leads to a malty refreshing taste with a smooth, full bodied finish. The slightly lingering bitterness gives a balanced, rounded experience which will leave you wanting more.

Our Brew Masters set the most stringent specifications for malting barley to ensure that the barley used in Crown is of Australiaâ€™s highest quality.

A handful of the 1,267 registered barley growers around the country qualify to supply this grade for Crown Lager. From this group, a selection of growers are chosen that Crown can confidently attest are â€˜Australiaâ€™s Finestâ€™ barley farmers.

Balancing a fine line between art and science - years of raw farming experience, technological backing and investment come together to create the key ingredient in every Crown Lager brew.

Our Brew Masters, working in conjunction with farmers at Rostrevor Hop Gardens, select from the Pride of Ringwoodâ€™s family of hops at harvest time in March every year. This ensures the very best hops are used exclusively for Crown Lager.

The seasonâ€™s first choice of hops enable our Brew Masters to better target the specific qualities within the hops that are used for the Crown Lager brew. These hops give a cleaner, smoother bitterness, providing Crown Lager with the distinctive finish that drinkers have savoured for generations.

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 340 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 415 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 84!

items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 8 years on Untappd!
You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 25 states or countries. Visit 5 more for Level 6!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 20 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 5!

Our Brew Masters, working in conjunction with farmers at Rostrevor Hop Gardens, select from the Pride of Ringwoodâ€™s family of hops at harvest time in March every year. This ensures the very best hops are used exclusively for Crown Lager.

The seasonâ€™s first choice of hops enable our Brew Masters to better target the specific qualities within the hops that are used for the Crown Lager brew. These hops give a cleaner, smoother bitterness, providing Crown Lager with the distinctive finish that drinkers have savoured for generations.

The quality, care and dedication that goes into Crown Lager is evident from the first sip.

Crown Lager has a bright golden appearance with a solid creamy head. The fruity aroma leads to a malty refreshing taste with a smooth, full bodied finish. The slightly lingering bitterness gives a balanced, rounded experience which will leave you wanting more.

items.badge_description: Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 160 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 33.
